aka: Love Express: The Disappearance of Walerian Borowczyk

cast.name: 安杰伊·瓦伊达 Andrzej Wajda
瓦莱利安·博罗夫奇克 Walerian Borowczyk
贝特朗·波尼洛 Bertrand Bonello

trans_title: 爱之快车：瓦莱利安·博罗夫奇克的消失
Love Express: The Disappearance of Walerian Borowczyk
introduction: A documentary celebrating the work of Walerian Borowczyk, a director of unparalleled sensitivity, revered in the 1970s, who was later labeled as a maker of erotic movies. Love Express features interviews with his closest collaborators, filmmakers and leading intellectuals who put his work into perspective, including Terry Gilliam, Bertrand Bonello, Neil Jordan, Andrzej Wajda, Patrice Leconte and Slavoj Zizek. It offers a rare insight into Walerian Borowczyk's work and poses questions about artistic freedom.
chinese_title: 爱之快车：瓦莱利安·博罗夫奇克的消失
